short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cokeep is an AI-powered bookmark manager that streamlines team workflows with smart organization and easy sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cokeep is the bookmark manager designed to transform your team's workflow with AI-driven bookmark organization and seamless sharing capabilities.

ðŸš€ Our key features: 
- Organize Your Bookmarks Visually: Transform your bookmarks into intuitive boards and spaces for easy access and management.
- Engage with Team Bookmarks: Boost collaboration with comments and likes on shared bookmarks within your team's spaces
- Share insights effortlessly: Easily share and spread cool and useful links to keep your team informed and inspired. 
- Store All Media Types: Save and organize any type of media (YouTube videos, blog posts, articles,...) all in one place. 
- AI-Enhanced Summaries and Tagging: Quickly scan content with AI-powered summaries and auto-tagging for smarter organization
- Privacy settings: Any thing you save can be visible to your team or only for yourself.

ðŸ¤© Who will fit Cokeep? 
Whether you're a content creator, academic researcher, or part of a remote team, Cokeep provides a shared knowledge platform that keeps everyone connected and informed.
